mapper.select: SELECT A.U_CD "종목코드", A.U_NM "종목이름" FROM FNS_U_MAST A WHERE (A.U_CD LIKE 'FI0%' OR A.U_CD LIKE 'S%')
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM FNI_STYLE_UNIV WHERE START_DT IN (SELECT MAX(START_DT) FROM FNI_STYLE_UNIV WHERE START_DT <= #{trd_dt}) AND U_CD = #{u_cd})

SELECT GICODE "종목코드", ITEMABBRNM "종목이름", LIST_STK_CNT "상장주식수", STK_QTY_AF "상장예정주식수", FF_RT_BAND "유동비율", INDEX_STK_QTY "지수채용주식수", PRICE "주가", CAP "지수채용시가총액", WE "비중" FROM( SELECT A.GICODE, D.ITEMABBRNM, C.LIST_STK_CNT, C.STK_QTY_AF, A.INDEX_STK_QTY, A.WEIGHT, B.FF_RT_BAND/100 FF_RT_BAND, C.CLS_PRC PRICE, A.INDEX_STK_QTY * C.CLS_PRC CAP, A.INDEX_STK_QTY * C.CLS_PRC / SUM(A.INDEX_STK_QTY * C.CLS_PRC) OVER (PARTITION BY 1) WE FROM JISUDEV.FNI_MFI_U_MAP_HIST A, FNI_FREE_FLOAT_RT B, FNS_JD C, FNS_J_MAST_HIST D WHERE A.U_CD = #{u_cd} AND A.TRD_DT = #{dt_univ} AND A.GICODE = B.GICODE AND B.APPL_DT IN (SELECT MAX(APPL_DT) FROM FNI_FREE_FLOAT_RT WHERE GICODE = A.GICODE) AND A.GICODE = C.GICODE AND C.TRD_DT = #{dt_prc} AND A.GICODE = D.GICODE AND D.TRD_DT = C.TRD_DT ORDER BY WE DESC)

SELECT GICODE "종목코드", ITEMABBRNM "종목이름", LIST_STK_CNT "상장주식수", STK_QTY_AF "상장예정주식수", FF_RT_BAND "유동비율", INDEX_STK_QTY "지수채용주식수", PRICE "주가", CAP "지수채용시가총액", WE "비중" FROM( SELECT A.GICODE, D.ITEMABBRNM, C.LIST_STK_CNT, C.STK_QTY_AF, A.INDEX_STK_QTY, A.WEIGHT, B.FF_RT_BAND/100 FF_RT_BAND, C.STD_PRC PRICE, A.INDEX_STK_QTY * C.STD_PRC CAP, A.INDEX_STK_QTY * C.STD_PRC / SUM(A.INDEX_STK_QTY * C.STD_PRC) OVER (PARTITION BY 1) WE FROM JISUDEV.FNI_MFI_U_MAP_HIST A, FNI_FREE_FLOAT_RT B, FNS_JD C, FNS_J_MAST_HIST D WHERE A.U_CD = #{u_cd} AND A.TRD_DT = #{dt_univ} AND A.GICODE = B.GICODE AND B.APPL_DT IN (SELECT MAX(APPL_DT) FROM FNI_FREE_FLOAT_RT WHERE GICODE = A.GICODE) AND A.GICODE = C.GICODE AND C.TRD_DT = #{dt_prc} AND A.GICODE = D.GICODE AND D.TRD_DT = C.TRD_DT ORDER BY WE DESC)

SELECT GICODE "종목코드", ITEMABBRNM "종목이름", WEIGHT "IIF", LIST_STK_CNT "상장주식수", STK_QTY_AF "상장예정주식수", FF_RT_BAND "유동비율", INDEX_STK_QTY "지수채용주식수", PRICE "주가", CAP "지수채용시가총액", WE "비중" FROM( SELECT A.GICODE, D.ITEMABBRNM, A.WEIGHT, C2.LIST_STK_CNT, C2.STK_QTY_AF, FLOOR(A.WEIGHT * B.FF_RT_BAND/100 * (C2.LIST_STK_CNT + C2.STK_QTY_AF)) INDEX_STK_QTY, B.FF_RT_BAND/100 FF_RT_BAND, C.STD_PRC PRICE, FLOOR(A.WEIGHT * B.FF_RT_BAND/100 * (C.LIST_STK_CNT + C.STK_QTY_AF)) * C.STD_PRC CAP, FLOOR(A.WEIGHT * B.FF_RT_BAND/100 * (C2.LIST_STK_CNT + C2.STK_QTY_AF)) * C.STD_PRC / SUM(FLOOR(A.WEIGHT * B.FF_RT_BAND/100 * (C2.LIST_STK_CNT + C2.STK_QTY_AF)) * C.STD_PRC) OVER (PARTITION BY 1) WE FROM FNI_STYLE_UNIV A, FNI_FREE_FLOAT_RT B, FNS_JD C, FNS_JD C2, FNS_J_MAST_HIST D WHERE A.U_CD = #{u_cd} AND A.START_DT = #{dt_univ} AND A.GICODE = B.GICODE AND B.APPL_DT IN (SELECT MAX(APPL_DT) FROM FNI_FREE_FLOAT_RT WHERE GICODE = A.GICODE) AND A.GICODE = C.GICODE AND C.TRD_DT = #{dt_prc} AND A.GICODE = C2.GICODE AND C2.TRD_DT = #{dt_stk} AND A.GICODE = D.GICODE AND D.TRD_DT = C.TRD_DT ORDER BY WE DESC)

SELECT GICODE "종목코드", ITEMABBRNM "종목이름", WEIGHT "IIF", LIST_STK_CNT "상장주식수", STK_QTY_AF "상장예정주식수", FF_RT_BAND "유동비율", INDEX_STK_QTY "지수채용주식수", PRICE "주가", CAP "지수채용시가총액", WE "비중" FROM( SELECT A.GICODE, D.ITEMABBRNM, A.WEIGHT, C2.LIST_STK_CNT, C2.STK_QTY_AF, FLOOR(A.WEIGHT * B.FF_RT_BAND/100 * (C2.LIST_STK_CNT + C2.STK_QTY_AF)) INDEX_STK_QTY, B.FF_RT_BAND/100 FF_RT_BAND, C.CLS_PRC PRICE, FLOOR(A.WEIGHT * B.FF_RT_BAND/100 * (C.LIST_STK_CNT + C.STK_QTY_AF)) * C.CLS_PRC CAP, FLOOR(A.WEIGHT * B.FF_RT_BAND/100 * (C2.LIST_STK_CNT + C2.STK_QTY_AF)) * C.CLS_PRC / SUM(FLOOR(A.WEIGHT * B.FF_RT_BAND/100 * (C2.LIST_STK_CNT + C2.STK_QTY_AF)) * C.CLS_PRC) OVER (PARTITION BY 1) WE FROM FNI_STYLE_UNIV A, FNI_FREE_FLOAT_RT B, FNS_JD C, FNS_JD C2, FNS_J_MAST_HIST D WHERE A.U_CD = #{u_cd} AND A.START_DT = #{dt_univ} AND A.GICODE = B.GICODE AND B.APPL_DT IN (SELECT MAX(APPL_DT) FROM FNI_FREE_FLOAT_RT WHERE GICODE = A.GICODE) AND A.GICODE = C.GICODE AND C.TRD_DT = #{dt_prc} AND A.GICODE = C2.GICODE AND C2.TRD_DT = #{dt_stk} AND A.GICODE = D.GICODE AND D.TRD_DT = C.TRD_DT ORDER BY WE DESC)
